tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  action VARCHAR(100),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    details VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_details TEXT,
    date_added DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    record_text TEXT,
    record_date DATE,
    is_approved BOOLEAN
);
